sentences.sentence: So, if you don't want to slow down for your own good, do it for the good of your noggin.
sentences.translation: 所以，如果你不想为自己的好而慢下来，请为你的头完好的缘故也慢下来吧。

sentences.sentence: The same reaction occurred within the brains of living (unexercised) mice given large doses of Noggin.
sentences.translation: 同样的反应也发生在被注入大剂量‘诺金’的活体小鼠（未锻炼的）大脑中。
